sub_title: Management consultant | Program & Project manager |  Digital Strategy | Digital Organization | Fit For Purpose Technology (Guild Lead) | Dutch (HQ) & Nordics office
summary:
I work at Anderson MacGyver Nordics in Stockholm (www.andersonmacgyver.com). In addition, as Guild lead Tech & Partners for Anderson MacGyver in the Netherlands, Sweden, and Germany, I am responsible for assignments in the field of rationalization, selection, sourcing, it procurmeent, implementation and transformation.

I am mainly involved in IT strategy development and realization for companies active in construction & engineering, logistics, wholesale, retail and manufacturing and for local government and educational organizations. 

I have a track record in selecting and implementing business applications (ERP/CRM/HR) including vendor selections. In the role of project manager I manages complex IT implementations (both solutions and infrastructure), often with an international focus. As EMITA (Executive Master IT Auditing) I also execute IT due diligences and audits on IT/ERP selection an implementation projects and the quality of IT departments.

My specialties: Implementation / transition and project management, especially for large and international project settings, Software and vendor selection, IT-purchasing (a.o. contract negotiation)

Industries: Wholesale, Retail, Construction & Engineering, Telecom, Manufacturing, Logistics, Publishing, Local government (Provinces, Municipality), Educational institutions, Finance & Insurance

My expertise areas: Audits, E-HRM, ERP, IT strategy, Information security, Information & Application architecture, Shared Service Centers, Datacenters, Dutch Trade Organisations (Brancheorganisaties)

I have experience with a.o. SAP (R3/All-in-One, CRM, Business One), IFS, Infor solutions, MS Dynamics Operations and Finance (Ax), Business operations (Nav) & Customer Engagement (CRM), Salesforce, Exact, Workday, Succesfactors, Advanced planning systems, Open Source solutions, Technical infrastructures

I hold Master Degrees in Business Administration and in IT Auditing and a Bachelor of Science Degree in Maritime Operations

treasury_media.title: Whitepaper-organizing-data-and-technology-Anderson-MacGyver.pdf
treasury_media.description:
Digitalization starts with organizing
Excessive attention to modern digital technology distracts from the real basic challenges of CIOs, CTOs, CDOs and other tech leaders. Adoption of solutions is pointless without the right organizational structure. Only when everything and everyone is positioned in the optimal role and function, the right technology choices can be made.

treasury_media.title: Whitepaper-governing-market-services-Anderson-MacGyver.pdf
treasury_media.description:
How to make the optimal choice in the market of IT services
Anyone considering purchasing or developing IT services and products should focus on their own organization and that of the supplier. The starting point is determining the business activity to be supported. The right IT solution and partnership – an optimal mix of contract and relationship – will automatically follow in a few logical next steps.

treasury_media.title: Anderson MacGyver | Introduction
treasury_media.description: More business value through IT Anderson MacGyver creates business value through smarter use of IT and information. No more 'IT versus Business'! We believe in a shared strategy focusing on the final customer. Anderson MacGyver helps in an authentic way to realize the commonly defined goals.

Enterprise Architect at vidaXL

profile_positions.description: Anderson MacGyver bekijkt IT vanuit het business perspectief en helpt klanten om meer businesswaarde te verkrijgen met IT en informatie. Dit is mogelijk door de waarde van IT voor de bedrijfsprocessen en diensten van een organisatie expliciet te maken en in balans te brengen met de IT-kosten. We dagen organisaties graag uit om een duidelijke visie te realiseren op de innovatieve mogelijkheden van IT en de waarde van de bestaande IT- en informatiediensten.
profile_positions.title: Management consultant | Guild Lead Fit-For-Purpose Technology | Program & project manager | Co-owner
Advisor on procurement and IT services via Anderson MacGyver

profile_positions.description:
Together with my Anderson MacGyver team we designed and implemented a new support landscape, including preparing the organization on a new way opf working (Adapt processes to the best practice of the new solution) and implementing Agile system implementation & optimization
August 2019 - January 2020: Determine scope, select solution & contract vendor & implementation partners
February - July 2020: Implement & Go live MVP (replace current systems with Salesforce Sales, Service & Marketing Cloud
August - September 2020: After care and issue solving
September 2020 - June 2021: Several optimation sprint to add functionality to the system
Also: Implement necessary new ways of working, e.g. installing product ownership
